entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
